description: the infamous lawless pirate haven and port of refuge
a heavily guarded British settlement and naval base & home to Governor Swann and Elizabeth
the mysterious island resembling a skull that could only be found by those who already knew where it was - where Barbossa's cursed treasure was hidden
the hidden fortress and haven for the world's pirates - where the Fourth and final Brethren Court is held
a limbo-like realm in the Land of the Dead where souls lost at sea go
the plague island with the ruined church and mill where the treasure chest containing Davy Jones' heart was buried
the cove where mermaids are hunted for their tears - necessary for the ritual at the Fountain of Youth
the legendary spring that grants eternal life
a treacherous supernatural region where Captain Salazar's ship and crew were cursed
the underwater resting place of the Trident of Poseidon
the capital of England and Great Britain where Jack and Gibbs are briefly apprehended
the bustling & fictionalized port where the Brethren Court meets to secure the map to the Locker
